getJoiningRules().details: Gets the CID of the joining rules of the channel.

returns._0: The CID of the joining rules of the channel.
3 bits 0x123. 1 = is it private chat, 2 = semaphore anonymous chat, 3 = joinable

name().details: Gets the name of the channel.
